attributes.name: axialStiffness
attributes.description: Horizontal stiffness parameter for seafloor in axial direction

attributes.name: axialFriction
attributes.description: Horizontal friction parameter for seafloor in axial direction

attributes.name: lateralStiffness
attributes.description: Horizontal stiffness parameter for seafloor in lateral direction

attributes.name: lateralFriction
attributes.description: Horizontal stiffness parameter for seafloor in lateral direction

attributes.name: stiffnessModulusRelationship
attributes.description: Relationship between dynamic stiffness and G-modulus

attributes.name: alpha
attributes.description: Scaling factor for peak soil suction relative to peak soil compression

attributes.name: beta
attributes.description: Scaling factor for peak soil suction relative to peak soil compression

attributes.name: kbc
attributes.description: Mobilization displacement for soil bearing capacity as fraction of pipe soil contact width

attributes.name: kt
attributes.description: Mobilization displacement for max soil suction as fraction of pipe soil contact width
